item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

7/16/2012's location will be:

Carissa's Cafe

Carissa’s Cafe is a great addition to the city of New Haven! Bringing positive vibes back to Humphrey Street, Carissa’s has an extensive menu at great prices. The entire building has been renovated from floor to ceiling and it is gorgeous inside. The owner and staff are all warm, friendly and attentive.

Carissa’s is a full service cafe and soon to open Corruption’s Lounge with live entertainment, local DJ's and a whole lot more!

They are located at 175 Humphrey St. in New Haven with parking lot parking available next to our building and across the street.


One of the owners (Brian) has Generously offered the following Specials:

Complimentary sampling of Appetizer Menu

$2-3 Drafts

$1 off all other drinks

 

Let's come out and support this new local business!

See their fresh article in the Independant - http://www.newhavenindependent.org/index.php/archives/entry/humphreys_east_reborn/

 

Parking: They do have a small lot attached to them.  Otherwise, street parking is available.

 

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

For more information about the Bar, please visit: http://www.carissascafe.com/

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host (contact number in RSVP) and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: NEW LOCATION Happy Hour - Carissa's Cafe
